testcase.name: testVerifyPassword_correctPassword_returnsTrue
testcase.system-out: 2025-07-01 16:46:29.057 [main] DEBUG c.consentmanager.utils.PasswordUtil - Password hashed successfully. 2025-07-01 16:46:29.423 [main] DEBUG c.consentmanager.utils.PasswordUtil - Password verification result: true

testcase.name: testVerifyPassword_incorrectPassword_returnsFalse
